name: All hallows like candy
description:
Objective: Go down to collect candy (need the pumpkin head attached) till you head is full,  then go up to empty the head.

  • Z: Pick / Throw head
  • X: Jump / Cancel Throw head
  • Left Right arrows: Move
  • SPACE: Start / Select
  • M: ?

In Halloween mode (hard) enemies are more, faster and aggressive. Pretty much is a punishment for the player :)

No guarantees for the Linux and Mac versions, sorry I just don't have a way to test them.
